name: Version 1.8-beta1
body:
⚠️ *ShowsRage* now supports Android 4.4 and up

## Features
- Added support for TVmaze and TMDb indexers when adding a new show

name: Version 1.7
body:
## Features
- New options when adding a show: "Future status" and "Season folders"

## Changes
- Update *ShowsRage*'s icon to support Android adaptive icon (Android 8.0+)

## Fixes
- Adding a new show is fixed
- The content of an episode's detail is available again

name: Version 1.7-beta2
body:
## Fixes
- Fix root folder selection when adding a show
- Fix a crash when accessing the detail of a show

name: Version 1.7-beta1
body:
## Features
- New options when adding a show: "Future status" and "Season folders"

## Changes
- Update *ShowsRage*'s icon to support Android adaptive icon (Android 8.0+)

## Fixes
- Adding a new show is fixed
- The content of an episode's detail is available again

name: Version 1.6.1
body:
## Fixes
- Fix crash in Schedule
- Fix crash in Logs

name: Version 1.6-beta3
body:
## Features
- Add an option to update logs automatically (off by default)

## Fixes
- Fixes a lot of crashes from 1.6-beta2

name: Version 1.6-beta2
body:
## Features
- Widget to display the _Schedule_

name: Version 1.6-beta1
body:
## Features
- Filter logs
- Widget to display the _History_
- Widget to quickly access a show

name: Version 1.6
body:
## Features
- Filter logs
- Add an option to update logs automatically (off by default)
- Widget to display the _History_
- Widget to display the _Schedule_
- Widget to quickly access a show

## Changes
- Remove OmDb integration

name: Version 1.5
body:
## Features
- Search subtitles for an episode
- New setting to ignore articles ("The", "A" and "An") when sorting the list of shows (English only)
- New setting to force the language of the application (English or French)
- Fast Scroll on the list of shows

## Changes
- Display an image for each episode
- Display subtitles information on the show overview
- Display subtitles information on the episode detail
- Enable pull-to-refresh on every screen

## Fixes
- Fix back from Settings

name: Version 1.4.1
body:
## Fixes
- Fix crash on show detail
- Fix various others crashes

name: Version 1.4-beta4
body:
## Fixes
- Various bug fixes and improvements

name: Version 1.4-beta1
body:
:tada: _ShowsRage_ now has its [dedicated website](https://MGaetan89.github.io/ShowsRage/).

## Features
- More information are available on the detail of an episode
- Specify a root directory when adding a new show

## Changes
- Reorganized _Settings_ section

## Fixes
- Episodes are now correctly listed when sorted in descending order

name: Version 1.4-beta3
body:
## Features
- Data received from _SickRage_ are saved locally on your device for faster and offline access

name: Version 1.4-beta2
body:
## Features
- Filter the list of shows
- New setting to use a light theme

name: Version 1.4
body:
:tada: _ShowsRage_ now has its [dedicated website](https://MGaetan89.github.io/ShowsRage/).

## Features
- Filter the list of shows
- Data received from _SickRage_ are saved locally on your device for faster and offline access
- More information are available on the detail of an episode
- Specify a root directory when adding a new show
- New setting to use a light theme

## Changes
- Reorganized _Settings_ section
- Performance improvements

## Fixes
- Episodes are now correctly listed when sorted in descending order

name: Version 1.3
body:
## Features
- Manual post-processing
- Search for a show by its name on the list of shows
- New setting to disable the automatic version check or customize the check interval
- New setting to display the banner on the list of shows

## Changes
- Display the air time of episodes in _Schedule_
- Display "Paused" status on the list of shows
- Long show/episode name now automatically scrolls horizontally
- "Play in an external video player" is no longer considered as an experimental feature
- Design update

name: Version 1.2
body:
## Features
- New setting to group the shows together and the animes together
- Show plot and episode plot can be selected and translated (requires Android 6.0)

## Changes
- New logo and colors thanks to [Concept211](http://www.concept211.com/)
- Rename _Coming episodes_ to _Schedule_
- Design update

## Fixes
- Images can now be loaded when using Basic Authentication
- Increase touch area of the menu of each episode in _Schedule_
- Remove _SD TV_ quality option from _Preferred quality_
- Remove _Archived_ episode status

name: Version 1.1
body:
## Features
- New setting to revert the order of the seasons
- New setting to revert the order of the episodes
- New setting to use Basic Authentication
- Display episode plot on click in _Coming Episodes_

## Changes
- Display show name in _Coming Episodes_

## Fixes
- Fix navigation between episodes of a specific season

name: Version 1.0.1
body:
## Fixes
- Using _ShowsRage_ was not possible if _SickRage_ was installed in a subfolder
- It is now possible to use HTTPS and self-signed certificate (new option in the _Settings_)

name: Version 1.0
body:
This is the first public release of _ShowsRage_.

## Changes
- New _Experimental features_ section in the _Settings_:
  - Play downloaded episodes in any video player, not only _VLC_
  - Google Cast™ needs to be explicitly enabled
- _IMDb_ and _The TVDB_ now open inside _ShowsRage_ (requires _Chrome_ 45)
- Replaced _TVRage_ button on each show overview with a _Web Search_ button

name: Version 0.9.5
body:
## Features
- Stream your episodes with Google Cast™ and control them from the application
- Control the video played on your Google Cast™ with the embedded remote control

## Changes
- Display a message when the application is not configured
- Dynamic colors on show detail are more readable
- Restart SickRage after an update
- Play a sound when a notification is displayed
- Hide empty information on a show overview

## Fixes
- Fix episode URL when playing in VLC (only works with shows in the default root dir)

name: Version 0.9
body:
## Features
- Update a show information from the show overview
- Rescan show from disc from the show overview
- Better tablet support in search results
- Better tablet support in _History_
- Display fan art on show overview (requires _SickRage_ v4.0.42)
- Display banner on show overview

## Changes
- Display quality in _History_
- More data received from _SickRage_ are translated
- Remove show poster from search results

name: Version 0.8.1
body:
## Fixes
- Fix crash on Android 5.0.
- Fix show dynamic color on Android 4.4

name: Version 0.8
body:
## Features
- Specify options when adding a new show
- Manually check for new _SickRage_ version

## Changes
- Theme colors dynamically change based on the show being viewed
- Automatic _SickRage_ version check now runs every 4h

name: Version 0.7
body:
## Features
- Check for new _SickRage_ version and update _SickRage_ from the application (requires _SickRage_ v4.0.30)
- Better tablet support in the _Coming episodes_ section

## Changes
- Return to the list of shows after deleting a show
- Various stability and performance improvements

name: Version 0.6
body:
## Features
- Partial tablet support (it will be improved in future versions)
- Set show quality from the show overview

## Changes
- Display show poster in search results
- Search is only triggered when the search key is pressed, and not after each query change

name: Version 0.5
body:
## Features
- Delete a show

## Changes
- Display indexer name in search results

name: Version 0.4
body:
## Features
- Pause/Resume show from the show overview
- Add application information in the _Settings_

## Fixes
- Fix crash when trying to add a new show

name: Version 0.3
body:
## Features
- Automatically get the API Key

## Changes
- Hide the password value on the _Settings_ screen
- Update global shows statistics
